title: Relates to improving quality of certain adult care facilities
summary: Relates to improving quality of certain adult care facilities.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                          658

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                      (PREFILED)

                                    January 5, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by  M. of A. GOTTFRIED, DINOWITZ -- Multi-Sponsored by -- M.
         of A. PHEFFER -- read once and referred to the Committee on Health

       AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to  the  adult  home,
         enriched  housing program and residence for adults quality enhancement
         fund

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1.  Section 91-f of the state finance law, as added by section
    2  51  of  part  B of chapter 58 of the laws of 2004, is amended to read as
    3  follows:
    4    S 91-f. Adult home, ENRICHED HOUSING PROGRAM AND RESIDENCE FOR  ADULTS
    5  quality  enhancement  fund.  1. There is hereby established in the joint
    6  custody of the state comptroller and the commissioner  of  taxation  and
    7  finance  a  special revenue fund to be known as the adult home, ENRICHED
    8  HOUSING PROGRAM AND RESIDENCE FOR ADULTS quality enhancement fund.
    9    2. The adult home, ENRICHED HOUSING PROGRAM AND RESIDENCE  FOR  ADULTS
   10  quality  enhancement  fund shall consist of moneys received by the state
   11  pursuant to section four hundred sixty-d of the social services law  and
   12  all  other moneys appropriated, credited or transferred thereto from any
   13  other fund or source.
   14    3. The moneys from the adult home, ENRICHED HOUSING PROGRAM AND  RESI-
   15  DENCE  FOR  ADULTS  quality  enhancement  fund shall be disbursed by the
   16  department of health to promote programs to improve the quality of  care
   17  in adult homes, ENRICHED HOUSING PROGRAMS AND RESIDENCES FOR ADULTS.
   18    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.


        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD02696-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to the adult home, enriched housing program and residence for adults quality enhancement fund
